title: Homagama - Meegoda Land Rs 300,000 per perch
location: Daham Mawatha, Naduhena Junction, Meegoda, Homagama, Homagama
details:
7.89 perches. Less than 100 meters to High Level Road. Very good flat rectangular land. Two side wide road access. Bus (122 Avissawella to Colmbo) stop is just less than 100 meters away – walking distance. A well is in the land. Within the limits of Homagama pradeshiya sabha. Colombo District. Western province.

Address: Daham Mawatha, Naduhena Junction, Meegoda, Homagama.

Contact Chintha: 0774293289. 0721901833, 112850611
